title: Wavefront Obj Wrong normals and material color in Gazebo 7.11

content.raw:
In gazebo 7.11 meshes loaded from an obj file appear to have the wrong material color and normals.

![obj_gazebo_7.11.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/1273936838-obj_gazebo_7.11.png)

Later versions of gazebo display this correctly

![obj_gazebo_8.1.1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2746434523-obj_gazebo_8.1.1.png)

I confirmed this is a bug in 7.11, but not in  8.1.1 or 9.0.0.  I'm creating an issue because I couldn't find either an issue or a pull request describing it. 

While gazebo 7 isn't EOL, this can probably be closed as wontfix with a workaround being to use a different mesh format in gazebo 7.
